message: Is it Good or Bad? I myself have absolutely no idea.
Both McMurphy and Chief Broom escape the institution, one way or another.

I would say good, considering the circumstances.  We know Chief was inspired to break out and experience freedom on a physical level.  His smothering of McMurphy is also freedom in both a physical/existential sense.  Had McMurphy lived at the end, it would have been bad/failure because he would have been under the complete control of the institution and Nurse Ratched.
